2+2 target plugins are available (1+1 in the item shop from 15 Jun to 7 Jul and 1+1 on the BP medal exchange from 15 Jun forever):
• TEC+600/counter+25%

Cooldown: 115/100 s.

• −60% to all enemies’ TEC damage resistance (for 2 turns)
• +60% to blue allies’ critical hit rate (forever)
